backend.static package¶

The purpose of this package is to generate a taylored index.html file.

If the user calls http://HOST:PORT/scenes

Submodules¶

backend.static.gen_index module¶

Generate a taylored index file.

backend.static.gen_index.make_index(scene_hash='', with_menu=True, with_colorbar=True, overlay_message=None)[source]¶

Generate a string that we can return to the browser, so it knows what it has to load.
